content: Just finished my second Spanish lesson today! The verb conjugations are challenging but I'm making progress. Practiced with a native speaker on a language exchange app for 30 minutes.
Completed another AWS practice exam and scored 78%! Getting closer to the passing grade. The networking section is still my weak spot, so I'm focusing on that this week.
Hit a writing milestone today - 15,000 words completed on my novel! The mystery is really taking shape. My characters are developing in ways I didn't expect.
Recorded the first module of my online course today! It took longer than expected but I'm happy with the quality. The lighting and audio setup is finally working well.
Had my first full Spanish conversation today! It was only 10 minutes but we covered basic topics like family, work, and hobbies. Feeling so motivated to continue!
Spent 4 hours today deep-diving into AWS VPC configurations. Finally understanding how subnets and routing tables work together. The concepts are clicking!
